doc.title: Toys
doc.plot: A group of children are window shopping at a toy store display, particularly at the G.I. Joe toy display. There, before their eyes, the soldiers come to life and the whole scene shifts to an encampment with all the soldiers acting in their roles. What happens is that a battle is fought with all the violence, confusion and carnage that wars usually have, but it is still put into stark perspective as these dolls fight.
